Flimbo
Wednesday, August 9th, 2017, 3:03:32 PM

I hate to step on someone's toes, but you might wanna put a hold on your auction there. I don't think items can have racial names anymore, like "dwarven". That sort of stuff used to go for huge sums of silver. As much as I like to see people get good deals, I don't wanna see something like that go for 20k if it's as rare as I think it is. That's like shaalk.

Mogonis
Wednesday, August 9th, 2017, 3:05:13 PM

I think it depends more on capitalization. Something with 'elven' is more of a craft style, whereas an "Elven" or "Warrior's" item has more significance and isn't allowed anymore.

Flimbo
Wednesday, August 9th, 2017, 3:05:39 PM

Yeah the forged part gave me pause, but it's worth asking someone about at any rate, just in case.
